title: Lambdaform Invoke executor
description: Wrapper around the 'sam local invoke' command. (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/serverless-application-model/latest/developerguide/sam-cli-command-reference-sam-local-invoke.html)

samConfiguration.description: Path to the SAM configuration file.

terraformDirectory.description: The name of the project directory where the *.tf files are stored.

__unparsed__.description: The command line input is stored in this internal property. The input is appended to 'sam local invoke', which is executed in the terraform directory.
